name: Kitty World
description:
Game about saving kittens.

Collect lovely kittens, blow bubbles and play mini games! This is not another super easy retro-style game, in this game you have to react fast, think fast, and of course to enjoy playing with the lovely colorful kittens.

A Note from Developer

This game was released in 2014 to iOS/Android, and later was removed for lack of updates. This is an HTML5 version of that same version, but due to issues in converting to HTML5 game might have bugs and missing features which might be resolved at some point in the future.
